user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, breathable underwear that provided a flattering fit and minimal visibility under clothing.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide a flattering fit and stay in place throughout the day. The features such as the no-ride-up leg bands and the moisture-wicking fabric were particularly appealing, as I wanted something that would keep me cool and dry. The positive reviews and the brand's reputation also influenced my decision, as I wanted to ensure I was purchasing a quality product.

I needed underwear that would be comfortable and not show lines under my clothes. The breathable cotton and X-Temp cooling features were important to me, as I wanted something that would keep me feeling fresh all day. The fact that it offered full coverage and was available in a convenient pack made it an attractive option. I also considered the brand's reputation and previous experiences with their products.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing items that are comfortable, soft, and made from high-quality materials like cotton. I value features such as moisture-wicking technology, roomy fits, and tag-free designs that enhance comfort. I also appreciate stylish details like flattering cuts and unique patterns. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer good value for money and durability, as indicated by my positive experiences with various casual and sleepwear items. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly sized or fall apart after washing, as well as those that do not meet my expectations for comfort and quality.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, breathable underwear with a flattering fit and minimal visibility under clothing. within my expected price range: [10.47, 17.0]
What specific color or style preferences do you have for the underwear you are looking for?
I prefer neutral colors like black, white, and nude for the underwear I'm looking for.
What size range are you looking for in the comfortable, breathable underwear with a flattering fit and minimal visibility under clothing?
I prefer sizes ranging from Small to Large for the comfortable, breathable underwear I'm looking for.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Fresh & Dry Light and Moderate Period 3-Pack Brief Underwear, Multiple Options Available> / Item ID: B0BGLP14S4 / Price: $15.72 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['At last, the freedom and confidence to go anywhere and do anything without worrying about leaks, odor or bulk. Hanes®\' COMFORT, PERIOD.™ briefs are made for moderate period protection, as well as life\'s other "oops" moments, from sneezing to laughing to coughing to exercising. Whether you need extra leak protection with your pad or tampon or are looking for postpartum underwear, our tagless period underwear for women and teens has you covered. The experts at Hanes® have designed them with an absorbent, multilayer stain-guard liner that holds liquid and neutralizes odors. Best of all, you can toss them in the washer and wear them over and over, like any underwear. This black brief 3-pack has brief-style legs, and full-coverage in front and back for sleek smoothness without bulk. The moisture-wicking fabric is stretchy, comfortable, and so comfortable you\'ll forget how superbly these period panties perform. To top it off, they\'re tagless for itch-free comfort. A customer favorite, the leak-protection performance of these absorbent period briefs in an all-black will free you from thinking about embarrassing leaks, on light days, not-so-light days, or any days.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Warner's Women's Blissful Benefits No Muffin Top 3 Pack Brief Panty> / Item ID: B076DMH4NQ / Price: $12.96 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Update your outfit essentials with the blissful benefits by Warner's no muffin top panties. Their flat waistband minimizes any bulge to ensure a smooth appearance under clothing. Made of soft polyester, they're comfortable enough for everyday. The addition of elastane provides subtle stretch to create a precise fit that moves along with you. These blissful benefits by Warner's panties provide full coverage in the back for a sensible addition to your intimates wardrobe. Their timeless silhouette complements any body type. A tag less design ensures no itch. With a variety of patterns and colors to choose from, you can have a new look every day (each sold separately). select from different styles. These brief panties are machine washable for easy-care convenience. Pair them with your favorite bra to complete the ensemble."]
